name: Matthew Pottinger
summary: Former Deputy National Security Advisor and Marine who resigned on January 6 and testified before the January 6 Committee that Trump's conduct was 'un-American.'

keyStatements.quote: I thought that the president's statements were inconsistent with his duty to preserve, protect, and defend the Constitution.
What I saw on January 6 was un-American and unconstitutional.
Trump should not be trusted with classified information or military power again.

timeline.event: Warned against Trump handling classified info

credibility.background: Former Deputy National Security Advisor, Marine Corps veteran, former journalist in China

oppositionReasons: Trump should not have access to classified information
Trump should not have military power
Trump cannot be trusted with national security
